Bashing the ADC players and lumping them together as delusional power hungry psychos doesn’t help the issue. You know who else needs to deal with ADC the burst, arguably the most? The enemy ADC who has to try to control the rapidly snowballing ADC. Acting like Marksman are the sole reason why they are insanely strong also hurts fixing the issue, because the nonstop ganks and roams bottom make the snowball worse. Not saying Marksman aren’t an issue, but come on man.

i wonder why there are so many roams and ganks bottom ... hmmm ... could it be because it decides the game? if the winning top laner auto won the game bot lanes would run teleport and there would be a 5 man gangbang top every game like there is bottom now.

> [{quoted}](name=TempName54846,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ie1oLpKB,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-04-20T20:21:27.476+0000)

> i wonder why there are so many roams and ganks bottom ... hmmm ... could it be because it decides the game? if the winning top laner auto won the game bot lanes would run teleport and there would be a 5 man gangbang top every game like there is bottom now.

Do you really have to wonder? 

Lets see:

Generally, bot is going to be underleveled compared to whoever roams. A lvl 6 mid will show up when both are 4/5. A lvl 6 top/jg will show up when bot is still 5. A lvl 6 syndra showing up bot will flat out murder a lvl 4/5 ADC.

There is usually a lot of extra CC thanks to Support kits. Easier ganks. ADCs are incredibly squishy early, and not threatening at all. Meaning, easy kills. I mean seriously if you are thirsty do you not go to where the water is? Or do you complain that the water is bot when you want it top? Botlane is the watering hole for gold in this game. Its the easiest to successfully gank, and their is dragon, and a paper turret down there, which is much easier to push down with a seiging  champ(ADC) and an extra person(Sup). At least 3-4 people pushing down a turret designed to  be pushed down early because of Lane Swaps. Which then leads into early dragons.

Top lane is much harder to gank. I know people fall for a 3:30 minute gank every single solo Q game, but that doesnt change the fact the champs up there are more resilient, higher level, and harder to take down. There is also less CC, and less damage up there, since there is less people. Its much harder for a tank/bruiser and a jungler to take down a top laner. Hell, if the top laner is ahead and is Riven/Renekton/Darius/Whatever, he can possibly 1v2 kill both of them. This doesnt happen botlane. One hook on the ADC botlane during a gank and hes probably dead. They are not tanky. 

The reason people gank bot is because its the easiest to do. It has the highest success rate. It leads to the easiest objectives. You cannot get a turret that easily by ganking top, even if you get a kill. They generally have TP, the turrets are tankier, and Top laners just seige worse. You kill the top laner he just TPs back in 15-20 seconds, to an armored up turret. You can easily get a bot lane turret if you just pressure the enemy bot lane out of lane. You dont even have to kill them. If you chunk them both, you can force htem out of lane and easily 3 man the turret.

Maybe the real issue is how easy the botlane turrets are to knock down, but this is a direct result because of Lane Swaps.
If you think an ADC, or even a bot lane, can snowball as hard as people claim without constant jungle and mid support, that's just ignorant.
if other roles mattered as much all roles wouldn't be "supporting" bot lane but rather other way around.

The term is made because AA is a good reliable source of sustain damage, which makes them scale well, and originally ADCs were intended as either late game DPS in teamfights or siegers. And note, **KEYWORD IS** **DPS**, not the currently twisted definition that they literally have the game as their bitch, spiking to ""late game"" with 2 items and doing _bursts-per-second_. They were never supposed to be the sole determinant of the game until very late in the late-game phase where only stat-checking really matters; but for some reason over the years the meaning has been completely corrupted into whatever nonsense we have today, that believes they LITERALLY is the center of everything just because they're a ""carry"", seriously.
